properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued January 15 at 4:02AM CST until January 16 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a Lakeshore
Flood Advisory...which is in effect from 6 PM this evening to
6 PM CST Thursday.

* LAKE SHORE FLOODING...Northwest winds to 35 mph are expected to
build waves of 6 to 9 ft and occasionally to 12 ft along the
Porter County shore.

* TIMING...Tonight and Thursday.

* IMPACTS...The increased wave action combined with ongoing
shoreline erosion may result in flooding along the Porter
County lakeshore. The water may threaten some roads near the
lake, including Lakefront Drive in the Beverly Shores area.
properties.instruction:
A Lakeshore Flood Advisory indicates that onshore winds will
generate flooding of low areas along the lakeshore.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY
